name: Pirate Clash
description:
Capture the other team's treasure!  Strategically navigate your pirates across the map, get to the other team's ship, steal their loot, and make it back alive before they make off with yours!

CONTROLS:

Player 1: WASD to move, W and S to aim gun, E to shoot, 1 2 3 4 5 (on top of keyboard) to change characters

Player 2: Arrow keys to move, up and down arrows to aim gun, slash to shoot, 1 2 3 4 5 (on keypad) to change characters

DIRECTIONS:

Each player takes turns moving their pirates around the screen.  You can change the current pirate you are moving during your turn, but you only have 10 steps total, so plan your moves wisely.  After you are out of steps, the pirate you are currently controlling will draw their gun.  Once the gun is aimed in the direction you want, press your fire button to shoot.  

The aim of the game is to grab the other team's treasure and bring it back to your capture point.  If the pirate carrying your treasure dies, they will drop it, and you can shoot the chest to place it back within your ship's possession.  The first team to carry the chest all the way back to the other side wins.
